welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Lockport, the charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves as an additional terminal for overflow flights and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
